summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1988 for the improvement of Newport Avenue, from Thirty-eighth Avenue to Grand Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the underground and surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 20393, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
